programme.title: MeatEater - First Timers: Montana Mule Deer Part 1
programme.desc: Television personality Joe Rogan and his best friend, comedian Bryan Callen, join Steven Rinella for their very first hunt. On a float trip for mule deer through the rugged Missouri Breaks, this is as adventurous of a first hunt as anyone could hope for, and Steve's special guests are in for a memorable experience and delicious wild game field cooking in some gorgeous country.

programme.title: MeatEater - First Timers: Montana Mule Deer Part 2
programme.desc: Television personality Joe Rogan and his best friend, comedian Bryan Callen, join Steven Rinella for their very first hunt. On a float trip for mule deer through the rugged Missouri Breaks, this is as adventurous of a first hunt as anyone could hope for, and Steve's special guests are in for a memorable experience and delicious wild game field cooking in some gorgeous country.

programme.title: MeatEater - Swamp Stew: Michigan Bowfishing
programme.desc: Steven Rinella returns to his cherished boyhood stomping grounds along Michigan's Muskegon River. He'll paddle his canoe through the marsh to camp and bow fish for sucker, bowfin, and gar. With the rich bounty of overlooked aquatic foods that can be found in this freshwater paradise, he'll demonstrate how beat the heat by salt curing fish and later he'll prepare a camp meal of fried gar.

programme.title: MeatEater - The Wide Open: New Mexico Antelope
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and friend Cody Lujan head to Northeastern New Mexico to hunt pronghorn antelope, the fastest big game animal in the United States. In the wide open desert plains, Steve will have to work hard to stalk within range of a mature buck. The payoff will be antelope loin topped with local New Mexico chiles.

programme.title: MeatEater - Primal Cuts: Bone-in Cooking Special
programme.desc: In this cooking special, Steven Rinella shows his fans some of his favorite preparations for big, bone-in cuts of red meat. Interspersed with highlights from his recent caribou, buffalo, and mule deer hunts, the show features recipes that utilize some of the most underappreciated parts of big game animals. This episode is an attractive and delicious tribute to Steve's gun-to-table ethic.

programme.title: MeatEater - El Venado Blanco: Mexico Coues Deer
programme.desc: Steven Rinella returns to his favorite hunting grounds of Sonora, Mexico to hunt for a Coues deer buck during the peak rutting season. Steve sets up camp and spends days glassing mountains and canyons for these elusive, wary desert whitetails. Meanwhile, his hunting partner, Remi Warren, attempts the difficult task of stalking one with a bow. To cap off the hunt, Steve cooks a batch of venison ribs braised in a Dutch oven buried beneath hot coals.

programme.title: MeatEater - Clash of the Titans: Northern California Pig & Deer
programme.desc: In this episode, Steven Rinella joins forces with fellow hunter and wild game chef Hank Shaw in the hills of Central California to go after Columbia blacktail deer, wild pigs, and a handful of small game species that are in season. The end result is a culinary smorgasbord of epic proportions.

programme.title: MeatEater - Sea Bear: Alaska Spring Bear and Seafood
programme.desc: Steve ventures out to his hunting and fishing shack on a remote coastline of southeast Alaska's Prince of Wales Island. While hunting bears from a skiff and a canoe, Steve gathers a variety of prime seafood and makes a discovery about his own motivations as a bear hunter.

programme.title: MeatEater - Full Boar: Whole Hog Cooking Special
programme.desc: Steven Rinella breaks down an entire boar and shares some of his favorite recipes in this Cooking Special. Matt Weingarter helps steve make head cheese, pork skin cracklins, smoked pork butt, and a tied-roast boned-out ham. Each dish requires thoughtful butchering, processing, and cooking to execute to perfection.

programme.title: MeatEater - Bull by Boat: British Columbia Moose
programme.desc: Steve and his buddy Ryan Callaghan float a remote river on a bull moose hunt in the wilderness of British Columbia. Here, they'll face one of the most dangerous moments in Steve's life as a hunter. But they'll also enjoy one the best wild game meals they've ever tasted.

programme.title: MeatEater - Local Motion: Montana Bull Elk
programme.desc: Steve must deal with bad weather and fierce competition during a late-season central Montana elk hunt. With some tips from a friend, Steve encounters plenty of elk on this public land hunt. But he'll have to hike hard in steep country and deep snow to get to the elk and away from other hunters.

programme.title: MeatEater - The Northern Rockies: British Columbia Grizzly Part 1
programme.desc: Steve and his buddy Ryan Callaghan, a British Columbia guide, hike into the steep backcountry of northern British Columbia in search of grizzlies and black bears. Among the beutiful alpine vista, this adventure includes some intense and up-close bear action ‚Äì almost too close.

programme.title: MeatEater - The Northern Rockies: British Columbia Grizzly Part 2
programme.desc: Steve and his buddy Ryan Callaghan, a British Columbia guide, hike into the steep backcountry of northern British Columbia in search of grizzlies and black bears. Among the beutiful alpine vista, this adventure includes some intense and up-close bear action ‚Äì almost too close.

programme.title: MeatEater - Opening Day: Wisconsin Whitetail Deer Part 1
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and his buddy Doug Duren give comedians Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen their first taste of Midwest deer hunting culture by sitting in freezing ground blinds on opening day in Wisconsin. It just wouldn't be a trip to the Duren Family Farm without a little trapping and duck hunting thrown in, rounding out the larder for a big wild game feast.

programme.title: MeatEater - Opening Day: Wisconsin Whitetail Deer Part 2
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and his buddy Doug Duren give comedians Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen their first taste of Midwest deer hunting culture by sitting in freezing ground blinds on opening day in Wisconsin. It just wouldn't be a trip to the Duren Family Farm without a little trapping and duck hunting thrown in, rounding out the larder for a big wild game feast.

programme.title: MeatEater - Spring Break: Florida Osceola Turkey
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and his friend and wild turkey specialist, Robert Abernathy, head to southern Florida to hunt Osceola gobblers. Steve hopes to finish off his Royal Turkey Slam, achieved by bagging all five subspecies of the American wild turkey‚Äîa quest that's been a decade in the making. These two turkey hunting fanatics celebrate with a delicious meal of grilled and stuff wild wild turkey breast.

programme.title: MeatEater - Boone and Bugles: Kentucky Bull Elk
programme.desc: Steven Rinella is invited by the Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation for a special opportunity to hunt elk during the rut in the mountainous coal country of southeastern Kentucky, a place where his hero Daniel Boone once roamed. This is Steve's first eastern elk hunt, and he quickly realizes that the rules of the game here are different. If he manages to track one down, he'll prepare what was supposedly Boone's favorite meal: elk liver.

programme.title: MeatEater - Cold Water: Alaskan Seafood Cooking Special
programme.desc: Join Steve on this Cooking Special as he dives into the best of Alaskan seafood, featuring shrimp, crab, fish, and clams. Learn how to make easy, delicious seafood recipes that showcase the fresh flavors of the sea. Whether you're a seasoned cook or a beginner, Steve's simple steps will help you prepare mouthwatering dishes that capture the essence of Alaskan waters.

programme.title: MeatEater - Big Buck Dreams: Colorado Mule Deer
programme.desc: Steve's annual quest for a giant mule deer buck continues this year in southwest Colorado. Here, Steve fills us in on his favorite critter, the mule deer. As he hunts will share his vast knowledge about these special western game animals including how to hunt, butcher, and most importantly how cook them-if he can put his tag on one.

programme.title: MeatEater - Surf N Turk: Wisconsin Turkey and Carp
programme.desc: Steven Rinella scratches his spring turkey itch this year as he visits Southeast Wisconsin to call in some big eastern Toms with his buddy Jerod Fink. The guys also plan to do some bow fishing after dark so they can enjoy a real Midwest turkey and fish fry.
